name: swiftpress
description: A modern WordPress + TailwindCSS boilerplate for building fast WordPress themes made and managed by [Dapo Obembe](https://www.dapoobembe.com). This lightweight, performance-focused WordPress Tailwind boilerplate provides a solid foundation for custom WordPress theme development with TailwindCss, Vite and Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) integration.

scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build:theme && npm run build && node package.js
